snippet.title: Darkest Dungeon II - Kingdoms Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#darkestdungeon #darkestdungeon2 #kingdoms

Kingdoms is an entirely new game mode coming to Darkest Dungeon II as a free update on January 27!  

Featuring a completely reimagined game structure, Kingdoms is a parallel game experience to the original Confessions game mode.  Players will be tasked with defending the realm from incursions by all-new enemy-factions. Journey across the land in your stagecoach, upgrade your Inns, complete quests and defeat the final boss.

Kingdoms will feature themed adventure modules, each containing a different threat. Up first is Hunger of the Beast Clan, where players will be tasked with fending off the pitiless onslaught of the rotting and ravenous beastmen! Two more adventure modules are planned for release in 2025.

Get Darkest Dungeon II on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1940340/Darkest_Dungeon_II/ 
Get Darkest Dungeon II on Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/darkest-dungeon-2 
Website: https://www.darkestdungeon.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/darkestdungeon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkestDungeon
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkestDungeon
Instagram: https://instagram.com/redhookstudios
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/darkestdungeon.bsky.social
